definitions: The action of moving by lifting the foot and bringing it down in a different place, or by moving one foot in front of the other.
The action of treading on something or someone.
The action of taking a particular action or measure.
The action of moving to a different level or stage.
examples: She is stepping carefully over the puddles.
He is stepping up to the challenge.
They are stepping into a new role.
The machine is stepping through the sequence.
